text: Itiopia kumate ne' Ebetmelekina amanage hunka ome asamio. Monafi sondia vahe'mofo Ra Anumzana Israeli vahe'mofo Anumzamo'a huno, Ama kuma'ma eri haviza hugahuema hu'na hu'noa kante amage ante'na ame hu'na eri haviza hugahue. Ana nehu'na azeri knarera osugahue. Ana hanigenka ana zupa kagra kavufinti kegahane.
